price: 71.Nabiyow sinaamak Yalli umman Qhiyaamah ayrô fanah amok siinik kate waa bar siinil heek yoh warisa keenik ixxic: diifuy baaxo elle tableeni Yallak kalah siinih baaha Yalla, tokkel isin siinik iyyaanam nummâ maabbah mataabbanaa?
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ مَنۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَأۡتِيكُم بِضِيَآءٍۚ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in jaʿala al-lahu ʿalaykumu al-layla sarmadan ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati man ilāhun ghayru al-lahi yatīkum biḍiyāin afalā tasmaʿūna
